EmailTemplate.name: CR 3.3.1 Invite to assessment - reasonable adjustments
EmailTemplate.subject: Your application for NCS with The Challenge 2015 - Assessment Booking
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. The email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact your staffing representative on {!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c}
Dear {!Contact.Name}
Congratulations! You have passed the first stage of our recruitment process. To move to the next stage you need to attend one of our group assessments.
Adjustment at assessment
In your application you indicated that you have a disability or condition that potentially requires adjustment at assessment. Prior to your assessment, we would like to discuss your requirements in more detail with you.
Please call or email me using the details below as soon as possible. We will need at least one week prior to your assessment to ensure we have everything in place.
How do I book onto an assessment?
In the meantime, please login to the Staffing Website and click on 'Booking Assessments'. In this section you can:
See a list of available dates Book onto an assessment Review details of your chosen assessment date Request alternative dates by submitting a form*
*Please note that we cannot always guarantee an alternative date within your availability.
Click here to book onto an assessment https://staffing.the-challenge.org/Login.aspx?ReturnUrl=%2fsecure%2f
Further information on the assessment booking can be found by clicking on the 'info' icons in the top right-hand corner of the page, and in section 4 of our FAQs.
I look forward to hearing from you soon.
Best Wishes NCS with The Challenge
{!Contact.OwnerFullName} {!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c} {!Contact.OwnerPhone} Email Reference: CR 3.3.1
